items.title: Bus Ticket Booking Functionality
items.description: Allow users to search for available buses, select seats, and book tickets through the app with a clear submit button to finalize booking.
acceptance_criteria: User can search buses by origin, destination, and travel date
Search results display bus operator, departure time, arrival time, and price
User can select available seats from a seat map
A clearly labeled 'Submit' button is available on the booking confirmation screen
Clicking the 'Submit' button finalizes the booking and triggers a booking confirmation with ticket details
dependencies: Bus schedule and seat availability data from operators
non_functional: System supports at least 1000 concurrent users
App available on iOS and Android platforms

notes: Updated requirement to include a clearly labeled submit button for finalizing bookings as per feedback.
